item.title: Splunk Named 2025 Americas Partner of the Year Finalist by Microsoft
item.description: Splunk has been named a 2025 Microsoft Americas Partner of the Year Finalist in the Software Development Company (SDC) award category.

item.title: Upgrading to Splunk Enterprise 10.0 and Splunk Cloud Platform 10.0: Key Resources for Public Sector Customers
item.description: Splunk Enterprise 10.0 and Splunk Cloud Platform 10.0 deliver the most secure, stable, and modernized platform for a digitally resilient and compliance-ready future.

item.title: Unlocking AI-Driven Operations with Splunk MCP Server on Azure Marketplace
item.description: Splunk has launched its Model Context Protocol (MCP) server on Azure Marketplace, making it easier to integrate with AI agents and tools in Microsoft Azure.

item.title: The Smartest Banks Are Betting Big on Payment Rails
item.description: Discover how leading financial institutions are transforming with modern payment rails—embracing AI, open banking, and third-party innovation to gain real-time visibility, boost customer trust, and drive growth.

item.title: IT Automation vs. Orchestration: What’s the Difference and Why Does It Matter?
item.description: Discover the key differences between IT automation and orchestration, their benefits, and best practices to optimize efficiency, scalability, and digital transformation.

item.title: NotDoor Insights: A Closer Look at Outlook Macros and More
item.description: The Splunk Threat Research Team breaks down the NotDoor Outlook-macro backdoor linked to APT28 and shows how to detect these stealthy techniques to strengthen security coverage.

item.title: How to Build an AI First Organization: Strategy, Culture, and Governance
item.description: Adopting an AI First approach transforms organizations by embedding intelligence into strategy, operations, and culture for lasting innovation and agility.

item.title: Hide Me Again: The Updated Multi-Payload .NET Steganography Loader That Includes Lokibot
item.description: An analysis on the updated .NET steganography loader delivering Lokibot malware, including evasion techniques, MITRE ATT&CK TTPs, and Splunk detections to enhance threat identification.

item.title: Managed Security Service Providers (MSSPs) Explained: Benefits, Core Services, and Industry Growth
item.description: Discover how Managed Security Service Providers (MSSPs) help organizations close cyber skill gaps, improve resilience, and defend against modern threats.

item.title: What is Observability? An Introduction
item.description: In this blog post, we'll look at definitions, best practices, and key concepts around Observability in IT.

item.title: What are SaaS, PaaS, & IaaS?
item.description: Yes, the cloud makes work better. But which cloud model is right for you? Understand how SaaS, PaaS, and IaaS works in this ultimate guide.

item.title: Telemetry 101: An Introduction To Telemetry
item.description: Telemetry is powerful data that can tell you all sorts of important information. Know what you can do with this useful data — get the full telemetry 101 here.

item.title: What Are SLMs? Small Language Models, Explained
item.description: Large language models have changed the world. What about small language models? Learn what SLMs are, how they differ from LLMs, and why SLMs are the future.

item.title: IT and Technology Spending & Budgets for 2025: Trends & Forecasts
item.description: Tech & IT spending is on the rise in 2025 across the globe. Read more on investment trends and see which regions will spend the most.

item.title: SIEM: Security Information & Event Management Explained
item.description: SIEM is a cybersecurity game-changer, especially for large organizations. Learn key SIEM features and functions & how to choose the right SIEM tool.

item.description: At .conf25, we unveiled new capabilities in Splunk Observability Cloud that redefine digital resilience in the AI era with smarter detection and investigation of business-critical issues.

item.description: Splunk's Kamal Hathi recaps our innovation highlights from .conf25, marking a pivotal moment for Splunk and Cisco as we deliver significant new value to our customers that make the use of AI a practical reality in their organizations.

item.title: Splunk Ranked Number 1 in the 2025 Gartner® Critical Capabilities for Security Information and Event Management Use Cases
item.description: Splunk has been ranked as the #1 SIEM solution in all three Use Cases for the second consecutive time in the 2025 Gartner® Critical Capabilities for Security Information and Event Management report.
